transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta') ~> source1
source1 derive(imdb_title_id = toString(byName('imdb_title_id')),
		title = toString(byName('title')),
		original_title = toString(byName('original_title')),
		year = toShort(byName('year')),
		date_published = toString(byName('date_published')),
		genre = toString(byName('genre')),
		duration = toShort(byName('duration')),
		country = toString(byName('country')),
		language = toString(byName('language')),
		director = toString(byName('director')),
		writer = toString(byName('writer')),
		production_company = toString(byName('production_company')),
		actors = toString(byName('actors')),
		description = toString(byName('description')),
		avg_vote = toString(byName('avg_vote')),
		votes = toString(byName('votes')),
		budget = toString(byName('budget')),
		usa_gross_income = toString(byName('usa_gross_income')),
		worlwide_gross_income = toString(byName('worlwide_gross_income')),
		metascore = toString(byName('metascore')),
		reviews_from_users = toShort(byName('reviews_from_users')),
		reviews_from_critics = toShort(byName('reviews_from_critics'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 alterRow(deleteIf(duration<100)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['imdb_title_id'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	versionAsOf: 0,
	fileSystem: 'delta') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
